para.text: GExperts is a free set of tools built to increase the productivity of Delphi and C++Builder programmers by adding several features to the IDE. GExperts is developed as Open Source software and encourages user contributions to the project.
GExperts would not exist without the help and advice of many people. For a list of credits, see the change log in the Readme.txt and open the GExperts about box.
